attributes.name: File Deletion via Shred v100.0.1
attributes.description: Malware or other files dropped or created on a system by an adversary may leave traces behind as to what was done within a network and how. Adversaries may remove these files over the course of an intrusion to keep their footprint low or remove them at the end as part of the post-intrusion cleanup process.
author: Elastic
attributes.query:
event.category:process and event.type:(start or process_started) and process.name:shred and
  process.args:("-u" or "--remove" or "-z" or "--zero")
